post.description: Validate whether a disk snapshot backup can be taken for list of volumes.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Volume Name List (currently only one volume name in the list is supported. Server would return error if list is bigger)

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Validate whether a list of backed up disk snapshots can be restored into ElasticSan volumes.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Disk Snapshot List (currently only one Disk Snapshot in the list is supported and that the Disk Snapshot must be in same azure region as the ElasticSan. Server would return error if list is bigger)

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: x-ms-delete-snapshots
parameters.description: Optional, used to delete snapshots under volume. Allowed value are only true or false. Default value is false.

parameters.name: x-ms-force-delete
parameters.description: Optional, used to delete volume if active sessions present. Allowed value are only true or false. Default value is false.

parameters.name: deleteType
parameters.description: Optional. Specifies that the delete operation should be a permanent delete for the soft deleted volume. The value of deleteType can only be 'permanent'.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

AutoScalePolicyEnforcement.description: Enable or Disable scale up setting on Elastic San Appliance.

AutoScaleProperties.description: The auto scale settings on Elastic San Appliance.

scaleUpProperties.description: Scale up settings on Elastic San Appliance.

DeleteRetentionPolicy.description: Response for Delete Retention Policy object

retentionPeriodDays.description: The number of days to retain the resources after deletion.

DiskSnapshotList.description: object to hold array of Disk Snapshot ARM IDs

items.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

value.description: The ElasticSan items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

availabilityZones.description: Logical zone for Elastic San resource; example: ["1"].

provisioningState.description: State of the operation on the resource.

baseSizeTiB.description: Base size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

extendedCapacitySizeTiB.description: Extended size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

totalVolumeSizeGiB.description: Total size of the provisioned Volumes in GiB.

volumeGroupCount.description: Total number of volume groups in this Elastic San appliance.

totalIops.description: Total Provisioned IOPS of the Elastic San appliance.

totalMBps.description: Total Provisioned MBps Elastic San appliance.

totalSizeTiB.description: Total size of the Elastic San appliance in TB.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The list of Private Endpoint Connections.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Allow or disallow public network access to ElasticSan. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.

autoScaleProperties.description: Auto Scale Properties for Elastic San Appliance.

baseSizeTiB.description: Base size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

extendedCapacitySizeTiB.description: Extended size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Allow or disallow public network access to ElasticSan Account. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.

autoScaleProperties.description: Auto Scale Properties for Elastic San Appliance.

EncryptionIdentity.description: Encryption identity for the volume group.

userAssignedIdentity.description: Resource identifier of the UserAssigned identity to be associated with server-side encryption on the volume group.

EncryptionProperties.description: The encryption settings on the volume group.

identity.description: The identity to be used with service-side encryption at rest.

EncryptionType.description: The type of key used to encrypt the data of the disk.

values.name: EncryptionAtRestWithPlatformKey
values.description: Volume is encrypted at rest with Platform managed key. It is the default encryption type.

values.name: EncryptionAtRestWithCustomerManagedKey
values.description: Volume is encrypted at rest with Customer managed key that can be changed and revoked by a customer.

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the set of User Assigned identities that will be used with this volume group. The key is the ARM resource identifier of the identity.

targetIqn.description: iSCSI Target IQN (iSCSI Qualified Name); example: "iqn.2005-03.org.iscsi:server".

provisioningState.description: State of the operation on the resource.

status.description: Operational status of the iSCSI Target.

currentVersionedKeyIdentifier.description: The object identifier of the current versioned Key Vault Key in use.

lastKeyRotationTimestamp.description: Timestamp of last rotation of the Key Vault Key.

currentVersionedKeyExpirationTimestamp.description: This is a read only property that represents the expiration time of the current version of the customer managed key used for encryption.

resourceId.description: Resource ID of the resource managing the volume, this is a restricted field and can only be set for internal use.

NetworkRuleSet.description: A set of rules governing the network accessibility.

virtualNetworkRules.description: The list of virtual network rules.

PreValidationResponse.description: response object for pre validation api

validationStatus.description: a status value indicating success or failure of validation

id.description: The ARM identifier for Private Endpoint

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: The response of a PrivateEndpointConnection list operation.

value.description: The PrivateEndpointConnection items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisioningState.description: Provisioning State of Private Endpoint connection resource

groupIds.description: List of resources private endpoint is mapped

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: A list of private link resources

nextLink.description: URI to fetch the next section of the paginated response.

PrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: Properties of a private link resource.

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.description: The private link resource Private link DNS zone name.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: Response for Private Link Service Connection state

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

ProvisioningStates.description: Provisioning state of the iSCSI Target.

PublicNetworkAccess.description: Allow or disallow public network access to ElasticSan. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.

SKUCapability.description: The capability information in the specified SKU.

value.description: A string value to indicate states of given capability.

ScaleUpProperties.description: Scale up properties on Elastic San Appliance.

unusedSizeTiB.description: Unused size on Elastic San appliance in TiB.

increaseCapacityUnitByTiB.description: Unit to increase Capacity Unit on Elastic San appliance in TiB.

capacityUnitScaleUpLimitTiB.description: Maximum scale up size on Elastic San appliance in TiB.

autoScalePolicyEnforcement.description: Enable or Disable scale up setting on Elastic San Appliance.

Sku.description: The SKU name. Required for account creation; optional for update.

locations.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available. This will be supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.).

locationInfo.description: Availability of the SKU for the location/zone

capabilities.description: The capability information in the specified SKU.
